transArray.content: It is very convenient to live and travel here. The subway and buses are nearby, and Chaoyang Station and the train station are within walking distance. The hotel is also equipped with a washing machine and dryer, which greatly improves convenience for those of us on business trips. The service is also very good, the room is very clean, and the price/performance ratio is very high.

Thank you for your affirmation of our work. The hotel is disinfected every day, and every detail of my location has been wiped with alcohol, so you can feel at ease in the room. There is Beijing Chaoyang Railway Station 700 meters away from the hotel, which is very convenient for travel. , also very close to Chaoyang Joy City, is your best choice for travel. There is nothing you can’t think of and nothing you can’t find. We look forward to your next visit!
